Before you go searching for Hulfryn's sheep, you should fill the trough outside his home with hay.
Find and <rgb=#00ff00>pet</rgb> sheep in Herne (4/5)
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away from the sheep!</rgb>
Sheep found ([placeholder]/5)
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away from the sheep!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>You are too far away from the sheep!</rgb>
'You couldn't find the last one? There can't be that many places for a sheep to hide in Herne....'
DNT
The last sheep doesn't seem to be anywhere in Herne...
Find and <rgb=#00ff00>pet</rgb> sheep in Herne ([placeholder]/5)
The fifth sheep remains missing.\n\nYou should tell Hulfryn. His home is in the south-west corner of Herne.
A farmer's sheep have fled their pen.
Shepherding Sheep
'Baa!'
'Baa!'
Fill the trough outside of Hulfryn's home with hay
Hulfryn's five sheep have fled their pen.\n\nYou should find them around Herne and pet them to calm them down.
Hulfryn's five sheep have fled their pen.\n\nYou should find them around Herne and pet them to calm them down.
DNT

'What were you doing out on the streets, stranger? Don't tell me you haven't heard about the evil things roaming about. I-I may not be a brave man, but something ain't right about those Riders. If I can live my life without ever seeing them again, I'll die content.

'If you're intent on returning outside, could you look around Herne for my sheep? The five of them got spooked and escaped the pen. Just pet them a bit and they'll calm down. I don't want them running off into the wilderness.

'Here -- before you go looking, take some of this hay and fill up their trough outside in the pen.'
Talk to Hulfryn
